title: My problem with the new client
body: When the game is starting and my wifi goes out i cant reconnect to the game it just continues to play in the background i can hear my teammates pinging me to come back but i cant get onto the game without reseting my pc. They added a reconnect button that shows up sometimes??? I thought they fixed it because i saw the reconnect button a few games back but no i just got 5 games of wait time because theres no way to reconnect for me via new client

replies.body: This issue may happen when you're able to make a connection to the game server but something is failing to render the game itself.  This could be due to either outdated drivers or something else.  I suggest using the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help fix that up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
